BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [ES|QL] Introduce AggregateMetricDoubleBlock (#127299) This commit adds a new Block type named AggregateMetricDoubleBlock and refactors AggregateMetricDouble to use it instead of CompositeBlock. The reasoning behind this is that there were many areas where we lost the distinction between a generic CompositeBlock vs using CompositeBlock specifically for AggregateMetricDoubles, and we felt it was best to split them into their own types.
